intro: It's up to you to blast away the approaching meteorite and become the savior of the Earth!
description:
[Prologue]
In the year 20XX, an asteroid that came from outside the solar system is approaching the Earth.
Humanity responds with a nuclear attack, but the meteorite is not destroyed and splits into 50 pieces──.
The only hope left is a lone demolition specialist!

[Game Overview]
"Earth Saver" is an exhilarating action game where you demolition and dismantle a giant meteorite approaching the Earth!
Place a bomb and it will explode with a bang in three counts!
If you successfully split the meteorite into small pieces, it will burn up in the atmosphere and the Earth will be safe!
Connect and explode, split cleanly, the exhilaration is at its MAX!
But if you're not careful, the large pieces will head straight for the Earth...!
This is a highly strategic action game where the timing and placement of the explosion are key.

The controls are simple.
Just move your character and place the bomb with the button!
Earth Saver is easy for anyone to play, yet deep.
It's a game that both beginners and blasting specialists can enjoy.

Plan your route within the limited time and protect the Earth with your intuition and judgment!

[Enjoy it over and over again with 7 diverse modes!]

[Difficulty modes]
EASY: Practice mode for beginners. No enemies, so you can relax!
NORMAL: A well-balanced mode for intermediate players.
HARD: A challenge mode for advanced players with a strict time limit!
EXPERT: A serious mode with fast enemies and no time carryover!
ULTIMATE: An ultra-difficult mode where you aim to clear all stages without making any mistakes!

[Featured challenge modes]
ENDLESS: Infinite stages with no goal! Challenge yourself to see how far you can go. Online rankings are also supported!
BATTLE: A blasting showdown between two players! A battle mode that you can enjoy with your friends by sharing play!
